answerText: An American Tragedy [10] This Dreiser novel sees its title character, who renamed herself Mrs. Stover, tend to Lester Kane even though he married Mrs. Gerald and abandoned the title character and her daughter, Vesta.
heading: ACF Winter |2009 | University of Illinois A and Missouri State A and University of South Carolina A | 15 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: To annoy Gilbert, Sondra Finchley invites the protagonist of this work to several parties in Lycurgus, New York, to which he had fled from Chicago after fleeing there upon running over a little girl in a car.  [10] Name this Theodore Dreiser novel in which Clyde Griffiths is sentenced to the electric chair after drowning his mistress Roberta Alden.
